              Argo (2012) Film
{_______________________________________________}
Based on true events, Argo chronicles the life-or-death covert operation to rescue six Americans, 
which unfolded behind the scenes of the Iran hostage crisis-the truth of which was unknown by the public for decades.
On November 4, 1979, as the Iranian revolution reaches its boiling point, militants storm the U.S. embassy in Tehran,
taking 52 Americans hostage. But, in the midst of the chaos, six Americans manage to slip away and find refuge
in the home of the Canadian ambassador. Knowing it is only a matter of time before the six are found out and likely killed
a CIA "exfiltration" specialist named Tony Mendez (Ben Affleck) comes up with a risky plan
to get them safely out of the country. A plan so incredible, it could only happen in the movies.
